title: (x) EMERG - (badly mangled) Times {Mark S}
content: I think it _is_ Times, but it has been condensed and has a stroke added to make it bolder.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content:
Okay. Here's 53pt Times New Roman, 2pt stroke, horizontally scaled to 70%:   
   
 ![itstimes](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27716.gif)   
   
There are several different versions of Times so it may not be the same exact one, but it's definitely Times.
